events.load: function () { const chart = this; const labels = ['04/18 - Fri', '04/19 - Sat', '04/20 - Sun', '04/21 - Mon', '04/22 - Tue', '04/23 - Wed', '04/24 - Thu']; const percents = [10, 25, 40, 55, 70, 85, 95]; labels.forEach(function (label, i) { const x = chart.plotLeft + chart.plotWidth * (percents[i] / 100); const y = chart.plotTop + chart.plotHeight - 10; chart.renderer.text(label, x, y).css({ color: '#ffffff', fontSize: '10px', fontWeight: 'bold' }).add(); }); }
